archiefmat.titel: Registers en staten van door de politie gestrafte slaven
archiefmat.titel_eng: Lists of slaves punished by the police
archiefmat.scope: The cases are numbered by year (each new year starting again with case no. 1). Recorded are : the name, sex, age and profession of the slave; name of the master; name of the person who asked for punishment; the crime or felony committed (theft, running away, being disrespectful towards the master, violence); date on which the punishment was executed; nature of the punishment (forced labour, imprisonment; corporal punishment; fixed number of beatings with a rope); the authority which ordered the punishment; additional remarks (more information on the nature of the crime) Zie foto's
